column4: i got nothing... how am i supposed to install unreal from my iso file? its asking for the install cd which is probably too scratched to work and i dont know how to use the linux cd burner or even where to get one... assuming linux even recognizes my burner as a burner
burning ISOs is easy - find them in your file manager, right-click on them, and select "Burn To Disc" - done
it's a wiki, it's always changing slowly - has something moved?
